name: Dolphin Holiday Resort
address: Compensation Beach Rd, Ballito, 4420, South Africa
description: Relaxed quarters with kitchens, plus a pool & cafe,  in a wooded setting a minute from the beach.
directions: Compensation Beach Rd, Ballito, 4420, South Africa

reviews.text: We camped here over the weekend, and it was amazing! The sites were clean and well maintained, the bathrooms spotless with good showers and baths, and the staff at the office were very friendly and helpful! Will definitely return!

Great place to camp. Roads a bit narrow and sites a little tight to comfortably get your caravan in... But with the friendly staff, they assist. Great location... Short walk to beach and shops right across the road.
This place was amazing I loved it people were very nice bathrooms are clean it's nice and close to the beach

I absolutely loved this place
I want to make a few sayings quickly
firstly the camping sites are big enough for most tents as my family all  went and had a bush trotter caravan tent thingy 3 other tents a braai eating table and our 4x4 toyota
secondly the entertainment is excellent love the big chess,the trampolines and jungle gym were so fun whats more they have a games hall with table tennis and pool though the best was the forest walk
you will love it amazing birdlife and you can see some little antelope
perfect for riding bikes
the beach is so close wich is really nice and the checkers right there is just so very useful
I just have one problem the tea and scones I hope this doesn't hurt your feelings but the person who handed out the tea and scones was very rude she didn't answer questions and just ignored me and you need to know this if you take children the children are not allowed to have tea or scones even if you are 17
they have cream soda and a marie biscuit for the children wich is really uncalled for
but other than that great place can't wait to go again but maby this time I wont have tea and scones or in the children's perspective cream soda and a marie biscuit
warm regards
Great location. Service is top class. Removal of waste and braai ash was prompt. Quiet. Helpful staff. Ablutions spotless.
